items.name: Ignite
items.description: High-level library to help with training and evaluating neural networks in PyTorch

items.name: joeynmt
items.description: JoeyNMT is a minimalist neural machine translation toolkit for educational purposes.

items.name: Pomegranate
items.description: pomegranate is a Python package that implements fast and flexible probabilistic models ranging from individual probability distributions to compositional models such as Bayesian networks and hidden Markov models
